name: Bospop

config_properties.name: Bospop
config_properties.description: A classic rock and pop festival in Weert, Netherlands, held annually since 1981.

ai_profile:
**Bospop 2026 Festival Profile**  
Taking place from July 10-12, 2026, Bospop once again brings its eclectic mix of genres and talent to the Netherlands. With a total of 39 artists performing, the lineup is rich in rock-centric sounds, featuring 15 rock acts, alongside blues rock (5), alternative rock (5), and indie rock (4). Other genres represented include soul, symphonic metal, and funk, ensuring a broad spectrum of musical tastes is catered to. The festival maintains its reputation for diversity, introducing unique acts across genres like Celtic punk, techno, comedy rock, and even EuroDada.  

Bospop 2026 highlights its international appeal, with artists hailing from 10 countries. The USA leads the pack with 10 acts, followed by the Netherlands (7), the UK (5), and Belgium (4), alongside talent from Canada, Australia, and more. While the majority of artists are male (26), the lineup also includes female-fronted acts and mixed-gender groups, showcasing a variety of perspectives on stage. Representation of people of color is limited but present, with 3 acts identified, reflecting the festival’s ongoing journey toward inclusivity.  

With an impressive average artist rating of 8.16 and 82% of acts connected to Spotify, Bospop 2026 offers a well-curated experience for music enthusiasts. The festival’s high ratings (with 28 of 31 rated artists receiving 8 or higher) suggest a strong focus on quality performances. From legendary rockers to rising indie stars, Bospop 2026 promises three unforgettable days of music that honor both tradition and innovation.
